## ğŸ¯ Quick Start (5 Minutes)

### Step 1: Enable GitHub Pages
- [ ] Go to https://github.com/Aptik09/bhindi-jarvis-ai/settings/pages
- [ ] Under "Source", select branch: `main`
- [ ] Select folder: `/ (root)`
- [ ] Click "Save"
- [ ] Wait 2 minutes for deployment

### Step 2: Access Your AI
- [ ] Visit: https://aptik09.github.io/bhindi-jarvis-ai/
- [ ] Bookmark the URL
- [ ] Test the chat interface

### Step 3: Mobile Setup
- [ ] Open on mobile browser
- [ ] Add to home screen
- [ ] Test voice input

## ğŸ†˜ Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**GitHub Pages not working?**
- Wait 2-3 minutes after enabling
- Check Settings â†’ Pages for deployment status
- Ensure `main` branch is selected

**Chat not responding?**
- Currently using simulated responses
- Real AI integration coming in Phase 2
- Responses are pre-programmed for testing

**Voice not working?**
- Allow microphone permissions
- Use HTTPS (required for voice)
- Try Chrome/Edge/Safari
- Check microphone settings

**Mobile issues?**
- Clear browser cache
- Try different browser
- Check internet connection
- Ensure HTTPS connection
